mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PR_GOODS_PAY_MEAN_INFO( /* prPregGoodsPayMeanInfoTrx.applyPregGoodsPayMeanInfo */ GOODS_NO , PAY_WAY_CD , USE_YN , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM ) SELECT #{goodsNo} , PAY_WAY_CD , USE_YN , #{sysRegId} , now() , #{sysRegId} , now() FROM PR_PREG_GOODS_PAY_MEAN_INFO WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo}
